FuncDef: This command is used in NAT64 multi-chassis redundancy in conjunction with filters. The configured peer6 address is an IPv6 address configured under an interface on the peering NAT64 node (active or standby). This IPv6 interface address is advertised via routing on the inside in order to attract traffic from the standby to the active NAT64 node.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 address of the NAT redundancy peer.
